text: John Guilbert Avildsen (December 21, 1935 - June 16, 2017) was an American movie director. He won the Academy Award for Best Director in 1977 for Rocky. Other movie he directed include Joe, Save the Tiger, Fore Play, The Formula, Neighbors, For Keeps, Lean on Me, The Power of One, 8 Seconds, Inferno, Rocky V and the first three Karate Kid movies. Avildsen died on June 16, 2017 in Los Angeles, California of pancreatic cancer, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American cinematographers Category:American movie editors Category:Movie directors from Chicago Category:Movie producers from Chicago Category:Screenwriters from Chicago
